</title>

<traits>

<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 64 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 2 hands

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This compression apparatus can reduce two [poisons](/equipment/alchemical-items/alchemical-poisons) into a more concentrated dose. As a 10-minute activity that has the [manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104) trait, you can use a poison concentrator to combine two doses of the same alchemical poison, creating a single concentrated poison with a +1 item bonus to its DC.
